features: Made with classic Doc's DNA, including grooved edges, yellow stitching and heel-loop
Built on the iconic Dr. Martens air-cushioned sole, which is oil and fat resistant, with good abrasion and slip resistance
tech_specs.\u2022 \nMaterial: Airwairs original signature leather: a firm, finished leather with a smooth, semi bright appearance.
tech_specs.\u2022 \nCare Instructions: [Smooth] = Clean Away dirt using a damp cloth, allow to dry apply correct coloured wax based shoe polish to restore shine as desired.
